fields.name: f-act
fields.description: The actual frame rate being displayed by X-Plane. Unless your computer is bogged down, this will be the same as f-sim.

fields.name: f-sim
fields.description: The frame rate the simulator is “pretending” to have in order to keep the flight model from failing.

fields.name: frame
fields.description: The time required to render one frame, in seconds.

fields.name: real
fields.description: The number of seconds, in the real world, elapsed since the simulator was launched.

fields.name: totl
fields.description: The number of seconds elapsed since the simulator was launched minus time spent in a loading screen.

fields.name: missn
fields.description: The time since the start of the “mission” (generally the time since the last time an aircraft or location was loaded).

fields.name: timer
fields.description: The time elapsed on a timer for general use.

fields.name: zulu
fields.description: “Zulu” time (Greenwich Mean Time, or GMT) in the simulator, in decimal hours (e.g., 3.5 for 3:30 a.m.).

fields.name: local
fields.description: Local time in the simulator, in decimal hours.

fields.name: hobbs
fields.description: The aircraft’s Hobbs time (a measurement of how long the aircraft’s systems have been run).

fields.name: Vind
fields.description: The craft’s indicated airspeed, in knots indicated airspeed.

fields.name: Vind
fields.description: The craft’s indicated airspeed, in knots equivalent airspeed (the calibrated airspeed corrected for adiabatic compressible flow at the craft’s current altitude).

fields.name: Vtrue
fields.description: The craft’s true airspeed (the speed of the craft relative to undisturbed air), in knots true airspeed.

fields.name: Vtrue
fields.description: True airspeed, in knots true ground speed.

fields.name: Vind
fields.description: The craft’s indicated airspeed, in miles per hour.

fields.name: Vtrue
fields.description: The craft’s true airspeed, in miles per hour airspeed.

fields.name: Vtrue
fields.description: The craft’s true airspeed, in miles per hour ground speed.

fields.name: Aircraft Mach speeds
fields.unit: vertical velocity, and g-loads (mach, VVI, G-load)

fields.name: Mach
fields.description: The aircraft’s current speed, as a ratio to Mach 1.

fields.name: VVI
fields.description: The aircraft’s current vertical velocity, in feet per minute. If everything is working as it should, this is normal to the local horizon under the aircraft.

fields.name: Gload
fields.description: The g-load across the aircraft, relative to the aircraft body-axis, if all is working as it should.

fields.name: Gload
fields.description: The axial g-load on the aircraft.

fields.name: Gload
fields.description: The side g-load on the aircraft.

fields.name: wind
fields.description: The wind speed around the aircraft, in knots.

fields.name: wind
fields.description: The wind direction, in degrees clockwise deviation from north. Wind blowing from north to south has direction 0.0, while wind blowing from west to east has direction 270.0.

fields.name: Q
fields.description: Q, dynamic pressure or velocity pressure, in pounds per square foot.

fields.name: gravi
fields.description: Gravitational force, in feet per second squared.

fields.name: AHRS
fields.description: Pressure in the attitude heading reference system (AHRS), as a ratio to normal.

fields.name: elev
fields.description: The user’s elevator input, as a ratio to full upward deflection. For instance, a value of –1.000 indicated the user is commanding the aircraft’s nose down as fast as possible.

fields.name: ailrn
fields.description: The user’s aileron input, as a ratio to full rightward deflection. For instance, a value of –1.000 indicated the user is commanding the aircraft to roll left as fast as possible.

fields.name: ruddr
fields.description: The user’s rudder input, as a ratio to full rightward deflection. For instance, a value of –1.000 indicated the user is commanding the aircraft to yaw left as fast as possible.

fields.name: elev
fields.description: The artificial stability system’s elevator input, as a ratio to full upward deflection.

fields.name: ailrn
fields.description: The artificial stability system’s aileron input, as a ratio to full rightward deflection.

fields.name: ruddr
fields.description: The artificial stability system’s aileron input, as a ratio to full rightward deflection.

fields.name: elev
fields.description: The proportion of the elevator deflected for upward pitch. If the elevators and flight inputs are in sync, this will match the combined yoke and artificial stability system input.

fields.name: ailrn
fields.description: The proportion of the aileron deflected for rightward roll. If the elevators and flight inputs are in sync, this will match the combined yoke and artificial stability system input.

fields.name: ruddr
fields.description: The proportion of the rudder deflected for rightward yaw. If the elevators and flight inputs are in sync, this will match the combined yoke and artificial stability system input.

fields.name: nwhel
fields.description: The nosewheel’s direction, in degrees of deviation from pointing straight ahead. For instance, a value of –31.000 indicated the wheel is pointed left 31 degrees.

groups.name: Wing sweep and thrust vectoring (wing sweep/thrust vect)
groups.description: Wing sweep and thrust vectoring (wing sweep/thrust vect)

fields.name: sweep
fields.description: The craft’s wing sweep, in degrees back from normal.

fields.name: sweep
fields.description: The craft’s wing sweep, in degrees back from normal.

fields.name: sweep
fields.description: The craft’s wing sweep, in degrees.

fields.name: sweep
fields.description: The craft’s wing sweep, as a ratio to fully forward.

fields.name: incid
fields.description: The craft’s wing incidence, as a ratio to fully angled.

fields.name: dihed
fields.description: The craft’s wing dihedral, as a ratio to fully angled.

fields.name: retra
fields.description: The craft’s wing retraction, as a ratio to fully retracted.

fields.name: L
fields.description: Roll torque, in foot-pounds, about the long axis, which we call the z axis.

fields.name: M
fields.description: Pitch torque, in foot-pounds, about the lateral axis, which we call the x axis.

fields.name: N
fields.description: Yaw torque, in foot-pounds, about the vertical axis, which we call the y axis.

fields.name: Q
fields.description: Pitch rate, measured in body-axes (when all is working as it should).

fields.name: P
fields.description: Roll rate, measured in body-axes (when all is working as it should).

fields.name: R
fields.description: Yaw rate, measured in body-axes (when all is working as it should).

fields.name: pitch
fields.description: The aircraft’s pitch, measured in body-axis Euler angles.

fields.name: roll
fields.description: The aircraft’s roll, measured in body-axis Euler angles.

fields.name: hding
fields.description: The aircraft’s true heading, measured in body-axis Euler angles.

fields.name: hding
fields.description: The aircraft’s magnetic heading, in degrees.

fields.name: alpha
fields.description: The aircraft’s angle of attack, in degrees.

fields.name: beta
fields.description: The aircraft’s angle of sideslip, in degrees.

fields.name: lat
fields.description: The aircraft’s latitudinal location, in degrees.

fields.name: lon
fields.description: The aircraft’s longitudinal location, in degrees.

fields.name: alt
fields.description: The aircraft’s altitude, in feet above mean sea level.

fields.name: alt
fields.description: The aircraft’s altitude, in feet above ground level.

fields.name: Location
fields.unit: velocity, and distance traveled (loc, vel, dist traveled)

groups.name: Latitude for all aircraft (all planes: lat)
groups.description: Latitude for all aircraft (all planes: lat)

fields.name: lat n
fields.description: Aircraft n’s latitudinal location (zero if craft n does not exist).

groups.name: Longitude for all aircraft (all planes: lon)
groups.description: Longitude for all aircraft (all planes: lon)

fields.name: lon n
fields.description: Aircraft n’s longitudinal location (zero if craft n does not exist).

groups.name: Altitude for all aircraft (all planes: alt)
groups.description: Altitude for all aircraft (all planes: alt)

fields.name: alt n
fields.description: Aircraft n’s altitude location (zero if craft n does not exist).

fields.name: moden
fields.description: Engine n’s current “mode,” where 0 corresponds to feathered, 1 corresponds to normal, 2 to beta, and 3 to reverse thrust.

fields.name: thrst
fields.description: The thrust, in pounds, generated by engine n.

fields.name: trq n
fields.description: The torque, in foot-pounds, generated by engine n.

fields.name: rpm n
fields.description: The current RPM of engine n.

fields.name: rpm n
fields.description: The current RPM of propeller n.

fields.name: ptchn
fields.description: The current pitch of propeller n.

fields.name: N1 n
fields.description: The current N1 for engine n.

fields.name: N2 n
fields.description: The current N2 for engine n.

fields.name: MP n
fields.description: The current manifold pressure for engine n, in inches mercury.

fields.name: EPR n
fields.description: The current engine pressure ratio for engine n.

fields.name: FF n
fields.description: The current fuel flow for engine n, in pounds per hour.

fields.name: ITT n
fields.description: The current interstage turbine temperature for engine n.

fields.name: EGT n
fields.description: The current exhaust gas temperature for engine n.

fields.name: CHT n
fields.description: The current cylinder head temperature for engine n.

fields.name: OILPn
fields.description: The current oil pressure for engine n, in pounds per square inch.

fields.name: OILTn
fields.description: The current oil temperature for engine n.

fields.name: FUEPn
fields.description: The current fuel pressure for engine n, in pounds per square inch.

fields.name: genrn
fields.description: The current generator amperage for generator n.

fields.name: battn
fields.description: The current batter amperage for battery n.

fields.name: battn
fields.description: The current battery voltage for battery n.

fields.name: fuel
fields.description: Fuel tank n’s weight, in pounds.

groups.name: Payload weights and center of gravity (payload weights and CG)
groups.description: Payload weights and center of gravity (payload weights and CG)

fields.name: empty
fields.description: The aircraft’s empty weight, in pounds.

fields.name: payld
fields.description: The aircraft’s payload weight, in pounds.

fields.name: fuel
fields.description: The total weight of the aircraft’s fuel, in pounds.

fields.name: jetti
fields.description: The aircraft’s jettisonable weight, in pounds.

fields.name: curnt
fields.description: The aircraft’s current weight, in pounds.

fields.name: maxim
fields.description: The aircraft’s maximum weight, in pounds.

fields.name: cg
fields.description: The aircraft’s center of gravity, measured in feet behind the reference point.

fields.name: lift
fields.description: The lift acting on the aircraft, in pounds.

fields.name: drag
fields.description: The drag acting on the aircraft, in pounds.

fields.name: side
fields.description: The side forces acting on the aircraft, in pounds.

groups.name: Landing gear vertical force (landing gear vert force)
groups.description: Landing gear vertical force (landing gear vert force)

groups.name: Lift-to-drag ratio and coefficients (lift over drag coeffs)
groups.description: Lift-to-drag ratio and coefficients (lift over drag coeffs)

fields.name: Lailn,n
fields.description: The deflection of left aileron n, in degrees.

fields.name: Railn
fields.description: The deflection of right aileron n, in degrees.

fields.name: Lsplr,n
fields.description: The deflection of left spoiler n, in degrees.

fields.name: Rsplr
fields.description: The deflection of right spoiler n, in degrees.

fields.name: elevn
fields.description: The deflection of elevator n, in degrees.

fields.name: rudrn
fields.description: The deflection of rudder n, in degrees.

fields.name: Lyawb
fields.description: The deflection of the left yaw brake, in degrees.

fields.name: Ryawb
fields.description: The deflection of the right yaw brake, in degrees.

fields.name: pitch
fields.description: The pitch forces acting on the controls in the pilot’s hands.

fields.name: roll
fields.description: The roll forces acting on the controls in the pilot’s hands.

fields.name: hdng
fields.description: The heading forces acting on the controls in the pilot’s hands.

fields.name: l-brk
fields.description: The left brake forces acting on the controls at the pilot’s feet.

fields.name: r-brk
fields.description: The right brake forces acting on the controls at the pilot’s feet.

groups.name: Total vertical thrust vectors (total vert thrust vects)
groups.description: Total vertical thrust vectors (total vert thrust vects)

groups.name: Total lateral thrust vectors (total lat thrust vects)
groups.description: Total lateral thrust vectors (total lat thrust vects)

Ground effect (drag) from stabilizers (grnd effect drag

wingn
fields.description: The lift generated by wing n.

fields.description: The drag generated by the horizontal stabilizer.

fields.name: vstbn

fields.name: COM n
fields.description: The current frequency of the COM n radio.

fields.name: COM n
fields.description: The standby frequency of the COM n radio.

fields.name: COM
fields.description: The transmit status of the COM n.

fields.name: NAV n
fields.description: The current frequency of the NAV n radio.

fields.name: NAV n
fields.description: The standby frequency of the NAV n radio.

fields.name: avio
fields.description: The status of the AVIO switch.

fields.name: nav
fields.description: The status of the navigation light switch.

fields.name: beacn
fields.description: The status of the beacon switch.

fields.name: strob
fields.description: The status of the strobe light switch.

fields.name: land
fields.description: The status of the landing light switch.

fields.name: taxi
fields.description: The status of the taxi light switch.

groups.description: Switches 6: clutch and artificial stability (switches 6: clutch/astab)

fields.name: set
fields.description: The desired speed setting for the autopilot.

fields.name: set
fields.description: The desired heading setting for the autopilot.

fields.name: set
fields.description: The desired vertical velocity setting for the autopilot.

groups.name: Auxiliary power unit and ground power unit status (APU/GPU status)
groups.description: Auxiliary power unit and ground power unit status (APU/GPU status)

fields.name: targ
fields.description: The status of the target selection.

fields.name: hydr
fields.description: The status of hydraulic pump n.

fields.name: hydr
fields.description: The hydraulic fluid in pump n.

fields.name: hydr
fields.description: The pressure of hydraulic pump n.
